description: Search the web with AI-powered insights and get structured results instantly

api_key.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

ai_overview.info: Generate an AI-powered overview/summary of the search results

safe_mode.info: Enable safe search to filter explicit content

spell_check.info: Enable automatic spell checking and correction of the query

max_results.info: Maximum number of search results to return (default: 10)

errors.import_error: JigsawStack package not found. Please install it using: pip install jigsawstack>=0.2.7

logs.search_parameters: Search parameters - Query: '{query}', AI Overview: {ai_overview}, Safe Mode: {safe_mode}, Spell Check: {spell_check}, Max Results: {max_results}
logs.search_complete: AI search complete - {results_count} result(s) found, AI Overview: {has_overview}
logs.search_complete_status: AI search completed successfully with {count} result(s).
